title: Bug 113047 - No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing does not appear. Closing the data set editor and reopening it does not resolve the issue.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.
2. In the data set editor, navigate to the data source page.
3. Change the data source to a different one that has no database/table/column information.

Actual Result: The children node listing does not appear when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Closing the data set editor and reopening it does not resolve the issue.
